ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Potters] Gnome/Barbarian/Troll templates
ygData.msgSnippet: I can not remember what the recipes are for them, but they are in the Pottery book under Cookie Cutters. That is what they are Cookie Cutters. I made up some
ygData.messageBody:
I can not remember what the recipes are for them, but they are in the
Pottery book under Cookie Cutters. That is what they are Cookie Cutters. I
made up some around Christmas so I could make cookies for my guild Christmas
Party. I hope this helps ya out.

Battlestaff Fuzzietoe, Mithaniel Marr <Wolven Reverence>
42nd Ranked Druid of Karana
Master Brewer, Master Baker, Master Potter, Master Fletcher


-----Original Message-----
From: inazuma@... [mailto:inazuma@...]
Sent: Friday, March 24, 2000 7:21 AM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Potters] Gnome/Barbarian/Troll templates


From: inazuma@...

What is the recipe for these templates? I saw a post that listed the
trivial for these items at 78, which is my next plateau, but I am
unsure how to make a finished product - or what that finished product
is? Your aid is appreciated.

-Inazuma
